summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 9, Byron Addition, being the alley between Rainier Avenue and Wetmore Avenue, from Walden Street to Byron Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13734 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
